com.facebook.buck.util.cache

Interface FileHashCacheEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingFileHashCacheEngine, StatsTrackingFileHashCacheEngine

    public interface FileHashCacheEngine
    This interface extracts the methods available to a file hash cache, so that the underlying implementation is hidden and can be swapped.
